title: League crashed, gave me a loot restriction because they remade
body: title, also can I still earn champion mastery tokens?

replies.body: Do you have a screenshot of the message you received that mentioned a loot restriction? Generally, you'll not be restricted from receiving loot from Leaverbuster or causing a remake.
I do not have a screenshot, but from what I remember it said specifically something about being afk. I have had a few crashes lately but only in champ select or client

It doesn't look like you have any current loot restrictions on your account.

As for your recent crashes, it sounds like your issue may be caused by your client briefly disconnecting from the servers. I recommend working through our [connection troubleshooting guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) as a first step in solving this. 

Let me know if you continue to see crashes.
o thanks, I doubt my crashes will be fixed but I think they started after the preseason
